description.text: A spiraling twister of tornado-force wind surges forth from your palm, unbalancing those it rushes over. Creatures on the ground within the area are knocked prone. A flying creature within the spell's area must instead succeed at a DC 25 Fly check or plummet to the ground, taking the appropriate amount of falling damage.
